channel.title: kerasgenerator on BagasBgy
channel.description: Recent content in kerasgenerator on BagasBgy

item.title: kerasgenerator v0.0.1 Released!
item.description: kerasgenerator package is designed to simplify the process of preparing the dataset so it could be properly passed to keras’ fit, evaluate, or predict on generator functions. Currently, it is still in a very early development stage–it is even only have 2 functions right now 😁. But it is my first experience in developing a package, and I really can’t resist to publish it to test some features from devtools, usethis, and pkgdown.
